message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement. My initial offer for the product is $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility.  While I'm interested, I'm looking to spend closer to $12,000.  Let's see if we can bridge the gap.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider it. My counteroffer for the product is $13,000.
